participant_1.background:
I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.
I'm doing my best to maintain a healthy weight.
I met a group of amazing people from all over the world who shared my passion for adventure.
i like the color purple.

participant_2.background:
I moved to the mountains to be closer to my mom and to enjoy skiing.
i read sci fi space adventures with a passion.
i like wide , open spaces.
I just finished painting my nails.
My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.

content.text: Good! I just painted my nails purple. How is yours?
It's going great! I'm cooking a big dinner for my book club tonight.
Oh fun! What are you making?
I'm making a lasagna. I've been working on it all day.
Lasagna is my favorite! I used to make it all the time when I lived in the mountains.
Oh really? I've never been to the mountains.
You should go! It's so beautiful. And there's so much to do, like skiing and hiking.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go skiing.
You should totally do it! I'll go with you.
That would be so much fun!
Great! We'll plan a trip soon.
